name: Jumpin Jason
description:
Attention soldier... get ready for action. Jumpin Jason is a fun, addicting platform shooter that has realistic physics and fast paced gameplay. If you want shooter action, you've come to the right place.

You play Jason, a reluctant hero trying to stop the Gorgons from colonizing earth. The Gorgons are an alien race from a near by star system who use their mind control powers to force animals and insects to fight for them.

Action                                 Keys
--------------------------------------------------
1. Run Left/Right          Left/Right Arrows
2. Aim                                  Up and Down
3. Shoot                              Insert
4. Jump                               Space
